notes: Fixed a critical defect where the Raceday Countdown would not update after creating a new raceday event.
Resolved a UI flicker with the countdown timer on page load.
Fixed a defect where the 'Add one now' link in the Vehicle Management warning message was not functional.
Fixed multiple critical defects related to the 'Edit Event' modal and the Raceday Countdown not updating correctly after creating a new event.
